name: The Fallen (itch) (LLDJ07)
description:
How many gems can you find?

< to move left

> to move right

you cant jump

if you fall from to high you will get damage

Spikes: kills you

Platforms:...... what do you expect?

gravity UP: makes the gravity go up

gravity DOWN: makes to garvity go down

Bounce platform: it is bouncy

Spider web: slows you
